title.text: Windows SharePoint Services Language Template Pack Service Pack 2 (KB887624)

description.text: Windows SharePoint Services Language Template Pack Service Pack 2 ensures that Windows SharePoint Services performs with full functionality when a Language Template Pack is installed.  This package services the following languages: Arabic, Portuguese (Brazil), Chinese (Simplified), Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Finnish, French, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian (Bokm√•l), Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Swedish, Turkish, and Chinese (Traditional). After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer. Once you have installed this item, it cannot be removed.
